PluginViewModel.Name: ConvertAML2OPCUA
PluginViewModel.Description: This AutomationML Editor plugin called 'ConvertAML2OPCUA' performs the mapping between AUTOMATIONML and OPC UA. The sewer address can be deﬁned by the user. The plugin generates an OPC UA speciﬁc XML ﬁle by pressing the button. Then, the OPC UA server with the previously created data and additionial information can be launched within a separate executable application.
PluginViewModel.Author: Kathrin Bott, Pascal Habiger and Armin Karle (Supervision: Prof. Rainer Drath) Hochschule Pforzheim
